So I made the kid a stand user and his stand is Cliffs of Dovers and it can create anything out of any material. I also made the black guy a stand user with a stand stronger and that explained how he beat the kid. So I made a comic where the kid gets he stand by two other stand users who help him learn about his stand. The next time he sees the guy he was with his girlfriend and he challenged him to a fight the girlfriend didn’t interfere. So the black guy activated his Stand Stronger, which is just boxing glove and as he gets angry he gets stronger, and so does the kid. At first the kid is winning as he is constructing things such as walls and throwing projectiles and his girlfriend is impressed. The Black guy gets the upper hand and started beating on the kid, but the kid punched the guy with his stand a couple times. The black guy is about to kill him but the kids stand activates and the guys bone end up creating spikes and the black guy faints from blood loss.

So the girl got seduced (I guess) the sister was forced on (and litterly fell just like that) the mother 
got seduced (I guess) and they all enjoy the good fuck. 
If I'm looking at all this... is the kid the bad guy here? Since if he didn't want to beat up the guy for 
just flirting the sister and mother would never come to this and maybe by some chance the girl wouldn't either.  I mean the ball started to roll when the kid wanted to beat up the guy.

Chapter 3 so its implied here that the girl and sister were luring away the kid for quite some time now 
so the guy could flirt/seduce the mother since all this time the kid was intefering with any guy trying 
to flirt with the mother so it never got anywhere, but with the kid not being there now, there wasn't any 
inteference between someone flirting with the mother. So she got seduced and only later found out that he 
was the one that beat the kid up. Meaning (I think) she was already having physical contact with the guy 
before learning about this fact, judging by her saying she wouldn't let him do all those things to her if 
she knew about that fact.

You know the story is really all like the kid, the girl, the sister, the mother and the guy. 
So chapter 1 the kid wanted to beat up the guy for flirting with the girl he had a crush on (kid totally the bully here wanting to beat up the guy). So the guy wins and somehow seduces the girl (its not really implied if he forced himself on her or not so... meh... the girl enjoys the good fuck). Chapter 2 the sister wanted to get even with the guy for hurting the kid (her brother). Uhm... wasn't it self defence cause the kid wanted to beat up the guy? That says something about the sister being a bully aswell (in my opinion). So in this one the guy does force himself on her (who knows what the sister tried to do to him or maybe nothing) and well she said F its good sex whatever (really... the girl you can argue with she was seduced but the sister just got fucked 1 time and thats that...).
Very disappointed
